name: Luxury Leather Tote Bag
description: Premium genuine leather tote bag with spacious interior and elegant design. Perfect for work or shopping with multiple compartments and secure zipper closure.

name: Designer Crossbody Bag
description: Stylish crossbody bag with adjustable strap and gold hardware. Compact yet functional with secure magnetic closure.

name: Canvas Backpack Purse
description: Trendy canvas backpack with leather trim. Multiple pockets and drawstring closure for casual everyday use.

name: Evening Clutch Bag
description: Elegant evening clutch with crystal embellishments. Perfect for formal events and special occasions.

name: Structured Shoulder Bag
description: Professional structured shoulder bag with top handle. Ideal for business meetings with laptop compartment.

name: Bucket Bag
description: Trendy bucket bag with drawstring closure and detachable shoulder strap. Spacious interior for daily essentials.

name: Hydrating Face Serum
description: Intensive hydrating serum with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Reduces fine lines and gives radiant, youthful skin.

name: Luxury Lipstick Set
description: Premium lipstick collection with 5 trending shades. Long-lasting formula with moisturizing ingredients.

name: Anti-Aging Night Cream
description: Powerful anti-aging night cream with retinol and peptides. Reduces wrinkles and improves skin texture while you sleep.

name: Eyeshadow Palette
description: Professional eyeshadow palette with 12 versatile shades. Highly pigmented colors for day and night looks.

name: Vitamin C Cleanser
description: Gentle vitamin C cleanser that brightens and purifies skin. Perfect for daily use with natural ingredients.

name: Mascara & Eyeliner Set
description: Waterproof mascara and precision eyeliner duo. Creates dramatic, long-lasting eye looks that won't smudge.

name: Educational Building Blocks
description: Colorful building blocks set that promotes creativity and motor skills. Safe, non-toxic materials perfect for ages 3+.

name: Plush Teddy Bear
description: Soft and cuddly teddy bear made from premium plush material. Perfect companion for bedtime and playtime.

name: Interactive Learning Tablet
description: Educational tablet with games, songs, and activities. Helps develop language, math, and problem-solving skills.

name: Wooden Puzzle Set
description: Eco-friendly wooden puzzle set with animal themes. Develops hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills.

name: Remote Control Car
description: High-speed remote control car with LED lights. Durable design for indoor and outdoor play, ages 6+.

name: Art & Craft Set
description: Complete art and craft set with crayons, markers, stickers, and paper. Encourages creativity and artistic expression.

name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium quality cotton t-shirt with comfortable fit. Made from 100% organic cotton for breathable comfort all day long.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Stylish denim jacket perfect for casual wear. Classic design with modern fit, featuring button closure and chest pockets.

name: Formal Dress Shirt
description: Professional dress shirt for formal occasions. Wrinkle-resistant fabric with tailored fit for a polished look.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: Slim fit jeans with stretch fabric for comfort and mobility. Classic five-pocket design with modern tapered leg.

name: Silk Blouse
description: Luxurious silk blouse with elegant drape. Professional yet feminine design perfect for office or evening wear.

name: Cardigan Sweater
description: Cozy cardigan sweater perfect for layering. Soft knit fabric with button closure and ribbed cuffs.
